page.title: 08People and play
page.content: The children mainly play around the roads skipping, roller-skating or biking. Sometimes for a change they go to a roller-skating rink to play or the swiming baths, or, occasionally visit the cinema. In the area a wide range of people can be found ranging from the poor to the wealthy. All kinds of people can be found in{Corporation Park}, playing bowls, tennis or just strolling along. In Blackburn most people have friends who they can turn to in their social circle and although a lot of talk behind people's backs goes on with the neighbours they are usually not too uncaring about people's feelings. Unemployment has affected a lot of people in the area, but people do not drop their standards and are mostly clean and tidy.
